item.description:
Concerned American...

Please join us this Tuesday November 15,  7 p.m. for the "Rhode Island Oath Keepers" meeting at Sonoma Grille, 7366 Post rd, North Kingstown, RI 02852. This month Rhode Island Oath Keepers is delighted to host guest speaker Phil Donahue, D.H.S. security officer, U.S. Army security, N.R.A.  pistol/rifle instructor and Founder of "CCW Point Blank."  Phil is a highly trained military and law enforcement veteran who draws upon extensive knowledge and experience to train others in how to avoid confrontation when possible, and how to effectively employ deadly force when life is in jeopardy.

http://www.ccwpointblank.com/Home_Page.php

Oath Keepers is a non-partisan association of currently serving military, reserves, National Guard, veterans, Peace Officers, and Fire Fighters who will fulfill the Oath we swore, with the support of like minded citizens who take an Oath to stand with us, to support and defend the Constitution against all enemies, foreign and domestic, so help us God. Our Oath is to the Constitution

Our motto is "Not on our watch!"

"Yours in Liberty" Randy Swanson 401-952-5015
item.name: Rhode Island Oath Keepers meeting
